subject: Bull Riding
Music
Horses
Rodeos
lead_paragraph: The singer Joan Sebastian is touring with his favorite horse, El Padrino, with whom Sebastian has shared some of his best and worst times. Together, they perform jaripeo, a form of bull riding.
snippet: The singer Joan Sebastian is touring with his favorite horse, El Padrino, with whom Sebastian has shared some of his best and worst times. Together, they perform jaripeo, a form of bull riding.
